page.title: 03MUIRSTON FARM (LITTLEMILL)
page.content: { Muirston farm is owned by Mr Wyllie. He{owns 950 acres}of land and{rents {290 acres more.}The farm is mainly beef cattle and sheep.They have 270 cattle and 3 bulls, also 800 breeding ewes.Each year he also grows approximately 40 tons of hay,1200 tons of silage and 100 tons of barley.He has 5 tractors.We were surprised that Mr Wyllie only employs one other worker,but during the busy times his wife and family help.The Wyllie farm has 4 working dogs.They keep a goat because goats milk is the closest to sheep's milk and can be used to feed pet lambs.Mr Wyllie enjoy's being a farmer , but does not like getting up early.
